remarks: Not-free for restricted existential quantification where ` y ` and ` A ` are distinct.  See ~ nfrexdxy for a version with ` x ` and ` y ` distinct instead.  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 30-May-2018.)
statement:
nfraldya.2 $e |- F/ y ph $.
nfraldya.3 $e |- ( ph -> F/_ x A ) $.
nfraldya.4 $e |- ( ph -> F/ x ps ) $.
nfrexdya $p |- ( ph -> F/ x E. y e. A ps ) $.
$d A y $.
